greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n! for n < 4; else a(n) = floor(P(n-1)/n) where P(n) = a(1) * a(2) * ... * a(n).
comment: Original definition: a(1)=1, a(n)=n*P(n-1) if P(n-1) < n, a(n) = floor(P(n-1)/n) if n <= P(n-1), where P(n-1) = a(1) * a(2) * ... * a(n-1).
mathematica: a[1] = 1; p[n_] := Product[a[k], {k, 1, n}]; a[n_ /; p[n-1] < n] := a[n] = n*p[n-1]; a[n_ /; n < p[n-1]] := a[n] = Floor[p[n-1]/n]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 12}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 22 2013 *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Oct 29 2002
ext: Corrected and extended by Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Apr 20 2003
